text:
e="preserve">Sadeque Hossain Khoka (12 May 1952 – 4 November 2019) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was the 2nd mayor of Dhaka City Corporation during 2002 to 2011. He was the vice chairman of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party and was President of undivided Dhaka city BNP. He was born in Dhaka.
Khoka died on 4 November 2019 in Manhattan of kidney cancer, aged 67.
